subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova was trounced Monday by Sabine Lisicki, whose deep, flat ground strokes sent Sharapova scurrying from side to side and, ultimately, out of the tournament.
snippet: Maria Sharapova was trounced Monday by Sabine Lisicki, whose deep, flat ground strokes sent Sharapova scurrying from side to side and, ultimately, out of the tournament.
